acceptOwnership().details: The new owner accepts the ownership transfer.

changeEndTime(uint256,uint40).details: Only the host can change end timePool status must not be ENDED

changeStartTime(uint256,uint40).details: Only the host can change start timePool status must not be STARTED

claimWinning(uint256,address).details: Pool status must be ENDEDUser must be a winnerUser must not have claimedEmits WinningClaimed event

collectFees(uint256).details: Only send to hostEmits FeesCollected event

collectRemainingBalance(uint256).details: Only send to hostEmits RemainingBalanceCollected event

createPool(uint40,uint40,string,uint256,.details: Pool status will be INACTIVEEmits PoolCreated event

params.depositAmountPerPerson: The amount to deposit per person
params.timeEnd: The end time of the pool
params.timeStart: The start time of the pool
params.token: The token to use for the pool

deletePool(uint256).details: Only the host can delete the poolPool status will be changed to DELETEDEmits PoolStatusChanged event

deposit(uint256,uint256).details: Pool status must be DEPOSIT_ENABLEDPool must not have startedUser must not be a participantAmount must be equal to depositAmountPerPersonEmits Deposit event

enableDeposit(uint256).details: Only the host can enable depositPool status must be INACTIVEPool status will be changed to DEPOSIT_ENABLEDEmits PoolStatusChanged event

endPool(uint256).details: Only the host can end the poolPool status must be STARTEDPool status will be changed to ENDEDEmits PoolStatusChanged event

forfeitWinnings(uint256,address).details: Only the host can forfeit winningsWinner must have winningsWinner must not have claimedEmits WinningForfeited event

returns._0: claimablePools The list of claimable pools
returns._1: isClaimed The list of claim status

returns._0: extraBalance The extra balance of the pool
feesAccumulated The fees accumulated in the pool
feesCollected The fees collected in the pool
deposit The deposit of the participant
balance The balance of the pool
poolIds The pool ids created by the host
poolIds The pool ids joined by the participant
amountWon The amount won by the winner

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

pendingOwner().details: Returns the address of the pending owner.

reenableDeposit(uint256).details: Only the host can re-enable depositPool status must be STARTEDPool status will be changed to DEPOSIT_ENABLEDEmits PoolStatusChanged event

refundParticipant(uint256,address,uint25.details: Only the host can refund a participantPool status must be STARTEDParticipant must be a participantPool balance must be greater than 0Emits Refund event

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

selfRefund(uint256).details: Pool status must not be ENDEDUser must be a participantUser must not have been refundedEmits Refund event

setWinner(uint256,address,uint256).details: Only the host can set the winnerWinner must be a participantAmount must be greater than or equal to pool balanceEmits WinnerSet event

params.amount: The amount to set as winner

startPool(uint256).details: Only the host can start the poolPool status must be DEPOSIT_ENABLEDPool status will be changed to STARTEDEmits PoolStatusChanged event

transferOwnership(address).details: Starts the ownership transfer of the contract to a new account. Replaces the pending transfer if there is one. Can only be called by the current owner.

changeEndTime(uint256,uint40).notice: Change end time of a pool

changeStartTime(uint256,uint40).notice: Change start time of a pool

enableDeposit(uint256).notice: Enable deposit for a pool, to prevent frontrunning deposit

forfeitWinnings(uint256,address).notice: Forfeit winnings of a winner back to pool,           used when winner not claim for long time

getClaimablePools(address).notice: Get claimable pools of a winner

getExtraBalance(uint256).notice: Get extra balance of a pool

getFeesAccumulated(uint256).notice: Get fees accumulated in a pool

getFeesCollected(uint256).notice: Get fees collected in a pool

getParticipantDeposit(address,uint256).notice: Get deposit of a participant in a pool

getParticipantDetail(address,uint256).notice: Get details of a participant in a pool

getParticipants(uint256).notice: Get participants list of a pool

getPoolFeeRate(uint256).notice: Get fees rate of late refund

getPoolsCreatedBy(address).notice: Get created pools by a host

getPoolsJoinedBy(address).notice: Get joined pools by a participant

getWinnerDetail(uint256,address).notice: Get details of a winner in a pool

getWinnersDetails(uint256).notice: Get winners details in array of structs of a pool

getWinningAmount(uint256,address).notice: Get amount won by a winner in a pool

reenableDeposit(uint256).notice: Re-enable deposit for a pool in case host wants to accept more deposit

startPool(uint256).notice: Start a pool, to prevent further deposits
